lead_paragraph: Members of the sect, the Islamic Movement in Nigeria, have said that as many as 800 people were killed during the clashes in December.

byline.contributor: Sunday Isuwa reported from Kaduna, and Dionne Searcey from Dakar, Senegal.
byline.original: By SUNDAY ISUWA and DIONNE SEARCEY

snippet: Members of the sect, the Islamic Movement in Nigeria, have said that as many as 800 people were killed during the clashes in December.

headline.main: Nigeria Plans Inquiry Into Deadly Clashes Between Army and Shiite Sect
